name: The Memory of a Killer
summary_text: Vincke and Verstuyft are the best detectives of the Antwerp police department. They are confronted with the murder on a leading executive and put all their effort to catch the murderer.

name: Troop Zero
summary_text: In rural 1977 Georgia, a misfit girl dreams of life in outer space. When a competition offers her a chance to be recorded on NASA's Golden Record, she recruits a makeshift troop of Birdie Scouts, forging friendships that last a lifetime.

name: The Brave
summary_text: A down-on-his-luck American Indian recently released from jail is offered the chance to "star" as the victim of a snuff film, the resulting pay of which could greatly help his poverty stricken family.

name: Retribution
summary_text: Breakfast, kiss to his wife, take the children to the school, a bomb under the car, one neverending day ahead.

name: Quatermass and the Pit
summary_text: A mysterious artifact is unearthed in London, and famous scientist Bernard Quatermass is called into to divine its origins and explain its strange effects on people.

name: Age of Heroes
summary_text: The true story of the formation of Ian Fleming's 30 Commando unit, a precursor for the elite forces in the U.K.

name: Shootout at Lokhandwala
summary_text: An account of the gangster Mahindra Dolas and his gang, which terrorized Mumbai City, and a massive war between Mumbai Police and gangs during 16 November 1991.

name: Tabutta Rövasata
summary_text: Mahsun is homeless and unemployed. He lives in Rumelihisari (one of the most picturesque and oldest quarters of Istanbul), and tries to stay alive with the help of local fishermen. Mahsun ...                See full summary »

name: The Ron Clark Story
summary_text: A small-town teacher relocates to one of the toughest classrooms in the country.

name: The Best Man
summary_text: Just before his best friend's wedding, the life of a Chicago writer becomes crazy when his best friend guesses that his new book's story is based on his bride's fervent past.

name: Patrik, Age 1.5
summary_text: A Swedish gay couple adopt what they think is an 18-month-old orphan, only to meet their new son, a 15-year-old homophobic delinquent.

name: Blackmail
summary_text: When Dev finds out his wife is cheating on him, he secretly blackmails his wife and her lover as a form of revenge.

name: The Emerald Forest
summary_text: After the son of engineer Bill Markham is abducted by an aboriginal tribe on the edge of the rain forest, the engineer spends the next 10 years searching for him.

name: Employee of the Month
summary_text: It just isn't David's day. First he gets fired at the bank, then his fiancee breaks up and throws him out of the house. The bank gets robbed and he gets shot. Twists follow.

name: The Ramen Girl
summary_text: An American woman is stranded in Tokyo after breaking up with her boyfriend. Searching for direction in life, she trains to be a râmen chef under a tyrannical Japanese master.

name: The Program
summary_text: Several players from different backgrounds try to cope with the pressures of playing football at a major university. Each deals with the pressure differently, some turn to drinking, others to drugs, and some to studying.

name: Full Frontal
summary_text: A day in the life of a group of men and women in Hollywood, in the hours leading up to a friend's birthday party.

name: Babysitting
summary_text: What was supposed to be a quiet night of babysitting a boy, turns into a complete chaos after a few babysitter's friends arrive.

name: Macskafogó
summary_text: In the year 80 AMM (After Mickey Mouse) on planet X the crime-syndicated Cats try to erase the Mouse-population once and for all. A scientist of the mice, prof. Fushimishi seems to have ...                See full summary »

name: Fantomas
summary_text: The best men of France - a brave journalist and an extremely energetic commissioner - attack the trail of a mysterious criminal mastermind.

name: Horror Express
summary_text: While travelling on the Trans-Siberian Express, an anthropologist and his rival must contain the threat posed by the former's cargo: a prehistoric ape which is the host for a lifeform that is absorbing the minds of the passengers and crew.

name: Carrie Pilby
summary_text: A person of high intelligence struggles to make sense of the world as it relates to morality, relationships, sex, and leaving her apartment.

name: Blood and Black Lace
summary_text: A masked, shadowy killer brutally murders the models of a scandalous fashion house in Rome.

name: Escape to Witch Mountain
summary_text: Two mysterious orphan children have extraordinary powers and are chased by a scheming millionaire. But where do these kids really call home?

name: Seven Chances
summary_text: A man learns he will inherit a fortune if he marries by 7 p.m. that same day.

name: Miles Ahead
summary_text: An exploration of the life and music of Miles Davis.

name: Man Down
summary_text: In a post-apocalyptic America, former U.S. Marine Gabriel Drummer searches desperately for the whereabouts of his son, accompanied by his best friend and a survivor.

name: D-Day
summary_text: A team of experts dispatched to bring in The Most Wanted Man in India almost achieve the unthinkable ... until something goes horribly wrong.

name: Talk to Me
summary_text: The story of Washington D.C. radio personality Ralph "Petey" Greene, an ex-con who became a popular talk show host and community activist in the 1960s.

name: Emmanuelle
summary_text: The wife of a French diplomat in Bangkok, Emmanuelle embarks on a voyage of sexual discovery.

name: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
summary_text: A couple who have been married for three years are shocked to learn that their marriage is not legally valid.

name: Flowers in the Attic
summary_text: Children are hidden away under an attic by their conspiring mother and grandmother.

name: Mangal Pandey: The Rising
summary_text: This is a film about the leader of the 1857 mutiny and his fight against the British rule.

name: A Cry in the Dark
summary_text: A mother whose child was killed in a dingo attack in the Australian Outback fights to prove her innocence when she is accused of murder.

name: The Haunting of Molly Hartley
summary_text: A girl with PTSD attempts to refresh her life at a new school, but soon finds it impossible when she's afflicted by not only bullying and bad memories, but also the supernatural.

name: Thirteen Conversations About One Thing
summary_text: In New York City, the lives of a lawyer, an actuary, a house-cleaner, a professor and the people around them intersect as they ponder order and happiness in the face of life's cold unpredictability.

name: A Royal Night Out
summary_text: On V.E. Day in 1945, as peace extends across Europe, Princesses Elizabeth and Margaret are allowed out to join the celebrations. It is a night full of excitement, danger and the first flutters of romance.

name: An American Carol
summary_text: An anti-American filmmaker who's out to abolish the July Fourth holiday is visited by three ghosts who try to change his perception of the country.

name: Foxy Brown
summary_text: A voluptuous black vigilante takes a job as a high-class prostitute to get revenge on the mobsters who murdered her boyfriend.

name: Street Trash
summary_text: A liquor store owner sells alcoholic beverages to homeless people, unaware of what the bottles actually contain: toxic brew.

name: The Paramedic
summary_text: Angel works in an ambulance service. After a tragic accident, his personal life begins to deteriorate as he becomes more and more suspicious of his partner Vane.

name: Double Trouble
summary_text: A jazz musician and a stunt man are the spitting image of two millionaire brothers. They take the job to replace them in Rio de Janeiro when someone plans to assassinate them.

name: Miss Bala
summary_text: Gloria finds a power she never knew she had when she is drawn into a dangerous world of cross-border crime. Surviving will require all of her cunning, inventiveness, and strength. Based on the Spanish-language film.

name: The Ones Below
summary_text: A couple expecting their first child discover an unnerving difference between themselves and the couple living in the flat below them who are also having a baby.

name: The Invisible Woman
summary_text: At the height of his career, Charles Dickens meets a younger woman who becomes his secret lover until his death.

name: The Big Green
summary_text: A teacher on exchange from England is placed in an underachieving Texan school, where she coaches the children in soccer, improving their self esteem and leading to unexpected success.

name: A Better Tomorrow II
summary_text: A restauranteur teams up with a police officer and his ex-con brother to avenge the death of a friend's daughter.

name: Waqt: The Race Against Time
summary_text: Ishwar Chandra Thakur is living the good life, content with his loving wife Sumitra and son Adiya. There is but one thing which gradually comes to annoy Ishwar: his son's laziness and ...                See full summary »

name: Indochine
summary_text: Eliane adopts Camille, whose Vietnamese parents were friends. In 1930, a French navy officer is interested in Eliane (owns 60km2 plantation) and later in Camille. There's an uprising in Vietnam against French colonial power.

name: Stuck
summary_text: A young woman commits a hit-and-run, then finds her fate tied to her victim.

name: The Greatest Story Ever Told
summary_text: An all-star, large scale epic movie that chronicles the life and ministry of Jesus Christ.

name: Free Willy 3: The Rescue
summary_text: 16-year-old Jesse and old friend Randolph try to foil an illegal whaler threatening Willy and his pregnant mate.

name: King Kong vs. Godzilla
summary_text: A newspaper and television station funded by a pharmaceutical company want a sensation, which happens to be the discovery of King Kong on an island. He is captured and brought to Japan, where he escapes from captivity and battles Godzilla.

name: Cabin Fever
summary_text: While visiting their getaway cabin, five friends succumb to a flesh-eating disease.

name: Hardcore
summary_text: A conservative Midwest businessman ventures into the underworld of pornography in California to look for his runaway teenage daughter who is making porno films in California's porno pits.

name: Gigantic
summary_text: A mattress salesman finds his plan to adopt a Chinese baby augmented by the arrival of a young woman, who comes into his workplace, falls asleep on one of the beds, and starts to affect his life upon waking up.

name: Imaginary Heroes
summary_text: The Travis family façade is destroyed by an event incomprehensible to them -- an event which will open locked doors and finally reveal the secrets that have haunted them for decades.

name: Na xie nian, wo men yi qi zhui de nu hai
summary_text: A group of close friends who attend a private school all have a debilitating crush on the sunny star pupil, Shen Jiayi. The only member of the group who claims not to is Ke Jingteng, but he ends up loving her as well.

name: Dzien swira
summary_text: 24 hours in the bitter life of a frustrated divorced teacher who stays in the vicious circle of his numerous obsessions.

name: Troll
summary_text: A wicked troll king in search of a mystical ring that will transform him to human form invades a San Francisco apartment complex where a powerful witch lives.

name: Black Beauty
summary_text: The fates of horses, and the people who own and command them, are revealed as Black Beauty narrates the circle of his life.

name: Psych: The Movie
summary_text: The old gang comes together during the holidays after a mystery assailant targets one of their own.

name: Bi Küçük Eylül Meselesi
summary_text: A beautiful girl who has everything. Charming, playful, in her own words: 'too joyful to fall in love.' A sudden car crash, and her heart stops for a few minutes. When she wakes up, ...                See full summary »

name: Morvern Callar
summary_text: After her beloved boyfriend's suicide, a mourning supermarket worker and her best friend hit the road in Scotland, but find that grief is something that you can't run away from forever.

name: Gifted Hands: The Ben Carson Story
summary_text: Biography of Ben Carson who grew up to be Dr. Ben Carson, a world famous neurosurgeon at Johns Hopkins.

name: The Girl in the Fog
summary_text: Special agent Vogel is sent to an isolated town in a remote mountain valley to investigate the case of a sixteen years old's disappearance.

name: Sen Aydinlatirsin Geceyi
summary_text: Thou Gild'st the Evenis about the ordinary sorrows, worries, and troubles of the townsmen with extraordinary abilities. In a small Anatolian town, life goes on; Cemal is an assistant ...                See full summary »

name: Project A 2
summary_text: Dragon is now transferred to be the police head of Sai Wan district, and has to contend with a gangster kingpin, anti-Manchu revolutionaries, some runaway pirates, Manchu Loyalists and a corrupt Police Superintendent.

name: Amy Schumer: The Leather Special
summary_text: Three minutes into her set, Amy Schumer claims that all good comedians have a "leather special," where they wear all leather and regret it later in their careers--this is hers. Amy muses on...                See full summary »

name: Jersey
summary_text: A failed cricketer decides to revive his cricketing career in his late 30's despite everyone being skeptical of his ability to do so.

name: Suspect
summary_text: When a homeless man is accused of murdering a Justice Department file clerk, a public defender is tasked with mounting his legal defense.

name: The Power of One
summary_text: An English boy, living in Africa during World War II, through his boxing prowess, becomes a symbol of hope, in a time of war.

name: The Element of Crime
summary_text: A cop in a dystopian Europe investigates a serial killings suspect using controversial methods written by his now disgraced former mentor.

name: Appleseed Ex Machina
summary_text: With Brialeos convalescing after a mission, Deunan is assigned a new and remarkably familiar partner as a strange wave of terrorist attacks plague Olympus.

name: Wilderness
summary_text: Juvenile delinquents are sent to a small British island after a fellow prisoner's death, where they have to fight for survival.

name: Phineas and Ferb the Movie: Across the 2nd Dimension
summary_text: Phineas and Ferb discover that Perry is a secret agent, and they all get stuck in an alternate dimension where Doofenschmirtz is the ruler of the tri-state area.

name: The Polka King
summary_text: Local Pennsylvania polka legend Jan Lewan develops a plan to get rich that shocks his fans and lands him in jail.

name: Wrong
summary_text: Dolph Springer wakes up one morning to realize he has lost the love of his life, his dog, Paul. During his quest to get Paul (and his life) back, Dolph radically changes the lives of others -- risking his sanity all the while.

name: Operation Christmas Drop
summary_text: Congressional aide Erica (Graham) forgoes family Christmas to travel at her boss's behest. At a beachside Air Force base, she clashes with Capt. Andrew Jantz (Ludwig), who knows her assignment is finding reasons to defund the facility.

name: Kokowääh
summary_text: Henry is a handsome screenwriter who is trying to win the heart of the woman he truly loves. His plans are interrupted when he finds Magdalena, a little girl at his house.

name: Day of Wrath
summary_text: The young wife of an aging priest falls in love with his son amidst the horror of a merciless witch hunt in 17th century Denmark.

name: The Disappearance of Eleanor Rigby: Him
summary_text: Told from the male perspective, the story of a couple trying to reclaim the life and love they once knew and pick up the pieces of a past that may be too far gone.

name: El Angel
summary_text: The angelic face of Carlos, a 17-year-old teenager, hides a dark facet of robberies, lies and murders.

name: Baaghi 2
summary_text: A battle-hardened army officer squares off against drug lords and Russian henchmen to save his ex-lover's kidnapped daughter in the underbelly of Goa, India.

name: Riding the Bullet
summary_text: When a man finds out his mother is dying and tries to hitchhike his way to the hospital, he is picked up by a stranger with a deadly secret.

name: Louis C.K. 2017
summary_text: Louis C.K. muses on religion, eternal love, giving dogs drugs, email fights, teachers, and more in a live performance from Washington D.C.

name: Noel
summary_text: Five New Yorkers come together on Christmas Eve, seeking a miracle.

name: Girlfight
summary_text: Diana, without her father knowing it, trains as a boxer and achieves impressive success, blazing new trails for female boxers.

name: Chi-Raq
summary_text: A modern day adaptation of the ancient Greek play Lysistrata by Aristophanes, set against the backdrop of gang violence in Chicago, Illinois.

name: Desierto
summary_text: A group of people trying to cross the border from Mexico into the United States encounter a racist man who has taken border patrol duties into his own hands.

name: Young Ones
summary_text: Set in the future when water is hard to find, a teenage boy sets out to protect his family and survive.

name: Balloon
summary_text: East Germany, 1979. After initially failing to flee from the East to the West in a self-built hot-air balloon, two families struggle to make a second attempt, while the East German State Police are chasing them.

name: A Christmas Prince: The Royal Wedding
summary_text: A year after helping Richard get to the throne, Amber is about to become his wife. But is she really made to be queen?

name: The Pretty One
summary_text: A tragedy presents Laurel with the chance to reinvent herself as her idolized twin sister, Audrey. As she eases into the life she has always wanted, she must decide between continuing the lie or revealing herself as the perfect fraud.

name: Innocent Blood
summary_text: Marie is a vampire with a thirst for bad guys. When she fails to properly dispose of one of her victims, a violent mob boss, she bites off more than she can chew and faces a new, immortal danger.

name: 101 Reykjavík
summary_text: Will the 30 y.o. Hlynur ever move out of his mother's apartment in Reykjavík? Social welfare keeps him passive but things change when his mother's Spanish friend, Lola, arrives and stays through Xmas and New Year's Eve.

name: Demons 2
summary_text: A group of tenants and visitors are trapped in a 10-story high-rise apartment building infested with demons who proceed to hunt the dwindling humans down.

name: Northmen - A Viking Saga
summary_text: A band of Vikings cross enemy lines and a panicked race begins. The losers will pay with their lives.

name: Lovely Molly
summary_text: Newlywed Molly moves into her deceased father's house in the countryside, where painful memories soon begin to haunt her.

name: Baskin
summary_text: A squad of unsuspecting cops go through a trapdoor to Hell when they stumble upon a Black Mass in an abandoned building.

name: Pollyanna
summary_text: A young girl comes to an embittered town and confronts its attitude with her determination to see the best in life.

name: Until the End of the World
summary_text: In 1999, Claire's life is forever changed after she survives a car crash. She rescues Sam and starts traveling around the world with him. Writer Eugene follows them and writes their story, as a way of recording dreams is being invented.

name: Witchfinder General
summary_text: A young soldier seeks to put an end to the evils caused by a vicious witch-hunter when the latter terrorizes his fiancée and kills her uncle.

name: The Gravedancers
summary_text: After a night of drunken exploits, Allison, Harris, and Kira are chased and terrorized by the ghosts of a child pyromaniac, an ax murderer, and a rapist.

name: Banshee Chapter
summary_text: Journalist Anne Roland explores the disturbing links behind her friend's sudden disappearance, an ominous government research chemical, and a disturbing radio broadcast of unknown origin.

name: The Thieves
summary_text: After a heist in South Korea, a gang of 5+1 fly to Hong Kong to look into a heist, in a Macau casino, of a $30M diamond, planned by someone unreliable. He brings in HK thieves as well. Can anyone be trusted?

name: Last Night
summary_text: A group of very different individuals with different ideas of how to face the end come together as the world is expected to end in six hours at the turn of the century.

name: The Odd Couple II
summary_text: Oscar and Felix take a road trip to their son and daughter's wedding.

name: Life Is Sweet
summary_text: A shop assistant, her cook husband, & their twin daughters ponder their lives over a few weeks in a working-class suburb north of London.

name: Deadly Illusions
summary_text: After a bestselling novelist suffering from writer's block hires a new nanny for her children, the line between fiction and reality starts to blur.

name: The Right Kind of Wrong
summary_text: Leo the dishwasher falls in love with a bride on the day of her wedding - to another man.

name: Trust
summary_text: After being thrown out of her house, Maria encounters a married woman who complains of not having children. Maria ends up in an abandoned house, where she meets Matthew. When a baby is kidnapped Maria sets out to find the woman.

name: Magic Magic
summary_text: A naive young tourist's road trip across Chile with friends turns into a waking nightmare.

name: Lilies of the Field
summary_text: A travelling handyman becomes the answer to the prayers of nuns who wish to build a chapel in the desert.

name: Blood and Wine
summary_text: A man who has failed as a father and husband commits a heist to make money for his fledging business, but things become complicated when his wife interferes.

name: Cría Cuervos
summary_text: In the twilight of Francisco Franco's dictatorship, an eight-year-old orphan and her two sisters find shelter in the house of their stern aunt, trying their best to acclimatise to a new reality. Will they summon up the courage to grow up?

name: The Powerpuff Girls Movie
summary_text: The movie shows the origin of the Powerpuff Girls before the cartoon series. It explains why they were born and why they dedicated their lives to fighting crime and the forces of evil.

name: Bad Guy
summary_text: An unfeeling gangster seeks to ruin the life of a young girl who rejected him. He forces her into prostitution and spies on her regularly, then he soon begins to fall for her.

name: Ammonite
summary_text: 1840s England, acclaimed but overlooked fossil hunter Mary Anning and a young woman sent to convalesce by the sea develop an intense relationship, altering both of their lives forever.

name: 84 Charing Cross Road
summary_text: True story of a transatlantic business correspondence about used books that developed into a close friendship.

name: The Mark of Zorro
summary_text: A young Spanish aristocrat must masquerade as a fop in order to maintain his secret identity of Zorro as he restores justice to early California.

name: Shanghai
summary_text: A '40s period piece which revolves around an American expat who returns to Shanghai in the months before Pearl Harbor due to the death of his friend.

name: The Children of Huang Shi
summary_text: About young British journalist, George Hogg, who with the assistance of a courageous Australian nurse, saves a group of orphaned children during the Japanese occupation of China in 1937.

name: Survive Style 5+
summary_text: Five bizarre stories with no apparent connection to one and other eventually become intertwined, resulting in surreal circumstances.

name: Zübük
summary_text: This is the story of the politician named Zubuk. He gets expelled from the political party that he is a member of, due to corruption. The journalist Yasar wants to make a news story about ...                See full summary »

name: Twin Peaks: The Missing Pieces
summary_text: Twin Peaks before Twin Peaks (1990) and at the same time not always and entirely in the same place as Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me (1992). A feature film which presents deleted scenes from Twin Peaks: Fire Walk with Me (1992) assembled together for the first time in an untold portion of the story's prequel.

name: It's Pat: The Movie
summary_text: The comedic misadventures of a person of indeterminate gender.

name: The Draughtsman's Contract
summary_text: A young artist is commissioned by the wife of a wealthy landowner to make a series of drawings of the estate while her husband is away.

name: The Taste of Others
summary_text: The lives of 6 people over 35 in Rouen, France, and their relationship to each other.

name: Ring of the Nibelungs
summary_text: The legend of Siegfried and Brunhild, loosely based on characters from the Norse sagas and the pre-Christian Germanic heroic motifs outlined in the Nibelungensaga.

name: Journey to Italy
summary_text: An unhappily married couple attempts to find direction and insight while vacationing in Naples.

name: Brute Force
summary_text: At a tough penitentiary, prisoner Joe Collins plans to rebel against Captain Munsey, the power-mad chief guard.

name: In Fabric
summary_text: In Fabric is a haunting ghost story set against the backdrop of a busy winter sales period in a department store and follows the life of a cursed dress as it passes from person to person, with devastating consequences.

name: The Sentinel
summary_text: A young woman moves into an apartment in a building which houses a sinister evil.

name: Tokyo Sonata
summary_text: An ordinary Japanese family slowly disintegrates after its patriarch loses his job at a prominent company.

name: Jagga Jasoos
summary_text: Join Jagga, a gifted teenage detective, who along with a female companion, is on a quest to find his missing father.

name: Dhadak
summary_text: Set in Rajasthan, this love story explores how the protagonists deal with issues like differences between castes and honor killings.

name: Judwaa 2
summary_text: Prem and Raja are twin brothers who are seperated at birth but are uniquely connected to eachother via their reflexes. They reunite as adults and set out to take down the underground smuggling world.

name: House of 9
summary_text: Nine strangers, with no apparent connection between them are abducted: drugged, kidnapped and sealed in a house together.

name: Campeones
summary_text: A basketball coach is sentenced to community service, forced to work with a team of mentally disabled players.

name: Toast
summary_text: The ultimate nostalgia trip through everything edible in 1960s Britain.

name: The Cure
summary_text: Erik, a loner, finds a friend in Dexter, an eleven-year-old boy with AIDS. They vow to find a cure for AIDS together and save Dexter's life in an eventful summer.

name: Jamaica Inn
summary_text: In Cornwall, 1819, a young woman discovers she's living near a gang of criminals who arrange shipwrecks for profit.

name: Until Death
summary_text: Stowe is a dirty cop who is hooked on heroin, and everyone dislikes him. Because of an accident he is put into a coma, and comes out of it a better person. He wakes up wanting to put things right.

name: Abandon
summary_text: An investigation of a college student's missing boyfriend becomes quite strange when she begins to see him periodically.

name: Chill Factor
summary_text: A new biological chemical weapon that explodes up to temperatures over fifty degrees Fahrenheit, falls into the hands of two men who try to make sure that it doesn't get stolen by a terrorist.

name: Eddie
summary_text: Coincidences lead to the New York Knicks, getting its loudest fan, Edwina "Eddie" Franklin (Whoopi Goldberg), as coach. Season victory?

name: My Awkward Sexual Adventure
summary_text: To win back his ex-girlfriend, a conservative accountant enlists the help of an exotic dancer to guide him on a quest for sexual experience, leading him into a world of strip clubs, sensual massage parlors, cross-dressing and S & M.

name: Rangeela
summary_text: A middle class young woman, who dreams of Bollywood fame, is caught in a love triangle between her childhood friend and a famous actor.

name: Ice Station Zebra
summary_text: USN nuclear sub USS Tigerfish must rush to the North Pole to rescue the staff of Drift Ice Station Zebra weather station.

name: Vice Versa
summary_text: A divorced executive named Marshall and his 11-year-old son, Charlie, casually touch a magical Tibetan skull, releasing a mysterious power that transfers Marshall's mind to Charlie's body and vice versa. Their problems have just begun.

name: Vera Cruz
summary_text: During the Mexican Rebellion of 1866, an unsavory group of American adventurers are hired by the forces of Emporer Maximilian to escort a countess to Vera Cruz.

name: Just 6.5
summary_text: The police are after a drug lord named Naser Khakzad, but when they finally manage to catch him, he tries whatever he can think of to escape and save his family.

name: Ask the Dust
summary_text: Mexican beauty Camilla Lopez (Salma Hayek) hopes to rise above her station by marrying a wealthy American. That is complicated by meeting Arturo Bandini (Colin Farrell), a first-generation Italian hoping to land a writing career and a blue-eyed blonde on his arm.

name: CBGB
summary_text: A look at the New York City punk-rock scene and the venerable nightclub, CBGB.

name: War and Peace
summary_text: Napoleon's tumultuous relations with Russia, including his disastrous 1812 invasion, serve as the backdrop for the tangled personal lives of two aristocratic families.

name: The Tashkent Files
summary_text: Revolves around the mysterious death of India's 2nd Prime Minister Shri Lal Bahadur Shastri and attempts to uncover if he had actually died a natural death, or, as alleged, was assassinated.

name: Confession of Murder
summary_text: Lee Du-seok publishes an autobiography describing murders he committed after the statute of limitations expires. A detective and one of the victim's mothers search for the author while another killer begins a spree of murders.

name: Naboer
summary_text: John has just been left by his girlfriend Ingrid. That day he allows himself to be seduced into a mystical and scary world, where it is impossible to separate truth from the lies

name: Mom
summary_text: After her daughter is sexually assaulted at a party, a furious mother sets out to destroy the lives of the four perpetrators who walked away free.

name: September
summary_text: At a summer house in Vermont, neighbor Howard falls in love with Lane, who's in a relationship with Peter, who's falling for Stephanie, who's married with children.

name: Spyder
summary_text: An intelligence officer attempts to save the city from a psychotic serial killer who kills people just to hear their loved ones cry.

name: Soodhu Kavvum
summary_text: Das, with his team, kidnap Arumai, son of a politician, who has been planning his own kidnapping to extract money from his father. Problems arise, when an insane cop is brought to handle the case.

name: Resurrection
summary_text: Chicago homicide detectives Prudhome and Hollingsworth are assigned to investigate a murder. Both become entangled in the plot of a serial killer whose goal is to recreate the body of Christ.

name: The Magician
summary_text: A traveling magician and his assistants are persecuted by authorities in Sweden of the 19th century. Their captures, however, didn't bring victory to those in power.

name: Santa's Slay
summary_text: Santa Claus is actually a demon who lost a bet with an Angel, so he becomes the giver of toys and happiness. But when the bet is off, he returns to his evil ways.

name: Shining Through
summary_text: An American woman of Irish, Jewish-German parentage goes undercover in Nazi Germany.

name: The Disappointments Room
summary_text: A mother and her young son release unimaginable horrors from the attic of their rural dream home.

name: Álom.net
summary_text: Regina, the once popular girl has to make new friends at her new, conservative school. Problems arrive when she becomes enemies with Lívia, the school's queen bee, and falls in love with ...                See full summary »

name: Ivan the Terrible, Part I
summary_text: During the early part of his reign, Ivan the Terrible faces betrayal from the aristocracy and even his closest friends as he seeks to unite the Russian people.

name: Wolfen
summary_text: A New York cop investigates a series of brutal deaths that resemble animal attacks.

name: Woman of the Year
summary_text: Rival reporters Sam and Tess fall in love and get married, only to find their relationship strained when Sam comes to resent Tess' hectic lifestyle.

name: The Jazz Singer
summary_text: The son of a Jewish Cantor must defy the traditions of his religious father in order to pursue his dream of becoming a jazz singer.

name: A Chorus Line
summary_text: Hopefuls try out before a demanding director for a part in a new musical.

name: Odd Man Out
summary_text: A wounded Irish nationalist leader attempts to evade police following a failed robbery in Belfast.

name: Escape from Tomorrow
summary_text: In a world of fake castles and anthropomorphic rodents, an epic battle begins when an unemployed father's sanity is challenged by a chance encounter with two underage girls on holiday.

name: Taxi No. 9 2 11: Nau Do Gyarah
summary_text: A cabbie (Patekar) and businessman (Abraham) both in need of big money partake in a two-hour adventure together.

name: In This Corner of the World
summary_text: Set in Hiroshima during World War II, an eighteen-year-old girl gets married and now has to prepare food for her family despite the rationing and lack of supplies. As she struggles with the...                See full summary »

name: How to Deal
summary_text: A teenager (Moore), disillusioned by too many examples of love gone wrong, refuses to believe that true love exists. Then this new guy (Ford) comes along...

name: Survival Island
summary_text: Three people - a rich couple and a crew member - are shipwrecked on a tropical island and their subsequent fight for survival becomes even tougher when they begin to turn on each other.

name: Before I Disappear
summary_text: At the lowest point of his life, Richie gets a call from his estranged sister, asking him to look after his eleven-year old niece, Sophia, for a few hours.

name: Le premier jour du reste de ta vie
summary_text: Five key days in a family's life.

name: Cannibal Ferox
summary_text: Three friends set out to disprove cannibalism on a trip to the Amazonian jungle, where they meet two men trying to escape a vicious cannibal tribe.

name: Kung Fu Yoga
summary_text: Two professors team up to locate a lost treasure and embark on an adventure that takes them from a Tibetan ice cave to Dubai, and to a mountain temple in India.

name: The Butcher Boy
summary_text: The antisocial son of an alcoholic father and a bipolar mother grows up in 1960s Ireland.

name: Dracula
summary_text: In 1913, the charming, seductive and sinister vampire Count Dracula travels to England in search of an immortal bride.

name: The Sea Hawk
summary_text: Geoffrey Thorpe, a buccaneer, is hired by Queen Elizabeth I to nag the Spanish Armada. The Armada is waiting for the attack on England and Thorpe surprises them with attacks on their galleons where he shows his skills on the sword.

name: Song One
summary_text: A young woman strikes up a relationship with her ailing brother's favorite musician.

name: The Lost City
summary_text: A wealthy Havana club owner and his family are torn apart by the violent sociopolitical upheaval brought about by the transition from the dictatorial regime of Batista to the Marxist revolution led by Fidel Castro in 1950s Cuba.

name: The Babe
summary_text: Babe Ruth becomes a baseball legend but is unheroic to those who know him.

name: Leprechaun 2
summary_text: On his one thousandth birthday, an evil leprechaun selects the descendant of one of his slaves to have as his bride, leaving it up to the girl's boyfriend to save her.

name: The Navigator
summary_text: Two spoiled rich people find themselves trapped on an empty passenger ship.

name: Damsels in Distress
summary_text: A trio of girls set out to change the male-dominated environment of the Seven Oaks college campus, and to rescue their fellow students from depression, grunge and low standards of every kind.

name: Manic
summary_text: After attacking another player with a bat during baseball at school, Lyle's sent to the psych ward. He meets other teenagers with problems. Will group therapy help?

name: Smala Sussie
summary_text: A young man returns to his hometown to look for his missing sister.

name: We Don't Live Here Anymore
summary_text: An indiscretion between two close friends tears down their respective marriages.

name: Son of Frankenstein
summary_text: Returning to the ancestral castle long after the death of the monster, the son of Dr. Frankenstein meets a mad shepherd who is hiding the comatose creature. To clear the family name, he revives the creature and tries to rehabilitate him.

name: Whisper
summary_text: Sinister things begin happening to kidnappers who are holding a young boy for ransom in a remote cabin.

name: Unutursam Fisilda
summary_text: An old pop singer who has Alzheimer's returns to her old house where she remembers her old days of climbing the stairs of fame and fortune while trying to deal with her older sister who holds her responsible for her ruined life.

name: Ca$h
summary_text: A man meets up with two "good guys" to recover what is unlawfully his, taking them on his whirlwind ride, doing things they never would have imagined, just to survive.

name: The Late Bloomer
summary_text: The story of an adult male who, after the successful removal of a benign tumor resting against his pituitary gland, experiences all the changes and effects of puberty over a three-week period.

name: Better Luck Tomorrow
summary_text: A group of over-achieving Asian-American high school seniors enjoy a power trip when they dip into extra-curricular criminal activities.

name: The Spiral Staircase
summary_text: In 1916, a shadowy serial killer is targeting women with "afflictions"; one night during a thunderstorm, the mute Helen feels menaced.

name: Dark Was the Night
summary_text: An evil is unleashed in a small town when a logging company sets up shop in the neighboring woods.

name: The Super
summary_text: A man becomes the superintendent of a large New York City apartment building where people mysteriously go missing.

name: Go for It
summary_text: Two men meet each other in a strange situation and end up being mistaken for robbers first, for secret service agents later.

name: I Want to Eat Your Pancreas
summary_text: A high school student discovers one of his classmates, Sakura Yamauchi, is suffering from a terminal illness. This secret brings the two together, as she lives out her final moments.

name: The Admiral
summary_text: When the young republic of The Netherlands is attacked by England, France, and Germany, and the country is on the brink of civil war, only one man can lead the country's strongest weapon, the Dutch fleet: Michiel de Ruyter (Frank Lammers).

name: Blackway
summary_text: An ex-logger comes to the aid of a woman who returns to her hometown in the Pacific Northwest and finds herself harassed and stalked by a former cop turned crime lord.

name: Fortress of War
summary_text: A war drama set during the Nazi invasion of the Soviet Union in June 1941, in which Soviet troops held on to a border stronghold for nine days.

name: Love Songs
summary_text: Ismael and Julie enter a playful yet emotionally laced threesome with Alice. When tragedy strikes, these young Parisians are forced to deal with the fragility of life and love.

name: Greed
summary_text: The sudden fortune won from a lottery fans such destructive greed that it ruins the lives of the three people involved.

name: Un Coeur en Hiver
summary_text: Beautiful violin virtuoso Camille has two obsessions: the music of Ravel, and a friend of her husband's who crafts violins. But his heart seems to be as cold as her playing is passionate.

name: Blankman
summary_text: A simpleton inventor becomes a superhero with a bulletproof costume and a low budget.

name: Let Us Prey
summary_text: Held in a remote police station, a mysterious stranger takes over the minds and souls of everyone inside.

name: Duets
summary_text: A professional karaoke hustler reconnects with his daughter and a bored suburban businessman turns outlaw karaoke singer, among other plotlines.

name: Rock 'n' Roll High School
summary_text: Ramones fanatic and delinquent Riff Randell battle it out with the strict new principle of Vince Lombardi High School, Miss Togar, with help from the Ramones.

name: Uncommon Valor
summary_text: Ten years after his son went M.I.A. in Vietnam, U.S. Marine retired Colonel Jason Rhodes assembles a private rescue team to find Americans held in P.O.W. camps in Laos.

name: Keloglan Karaprens'e Karsi
summary_text: Kelogan fights the black prince to serve justice.

name: Qi jian
summary_text: Seven warriors come together to protect a village from a diabolical General.

name: What's Up, Tiger Lily?
summary_text: In Woody Allen's directorial debut, he took the Japanese action film Kokusai himitsu keisatsu: Kagi no kagi (1965) and re-dubbed it, changing the plot to make it revolve around a secret egg salad recipe.

name: Le Corbeau
summary_text: A French village doctor becomes the target of poison-pen letters sent to village leaders, accusing him of affairs and practicing abortion.

name: City Heat
summary_text: Slick Private Investigator Mike Murphy (Burt Reynolds) and tough Police Lieutenant Speer (Clint Eastwood), once partners, now bitter enemies, reluctantly team up to investigate a murder.

name: Once Upon a Time in China II
summary_text: Arriving by train in Guangzhou, 1895, the trio fight off White Lotus followers, who want to kill all foreigners and the cute, European dressed 13th Aunt. It's not kung fu master Dr. Wong's (Jet Li) last fight.

name: Waterloo
summary_text: Facing the decline of everything he has worked to obtain, conqueror Napoleon Bonaparte and his army confront the British at the Battle of Waterloo.

name: The Match Factory Girl
summary_text: A woman's terribly dull life is upended by a one-night stand pregnancy, causing her to seek retribution.

name: The Good Guy
summary_text: Calm and quiet Daniel starts on Wall Street. His womanizing colleague, Tommy, encourages him to meet women. He unknowingly meets Tommy's girlfriend, Beth, and ends up in her 5 women book club. Will he find the woman?

name: Mustafa Hakkinda Hersey
summary_text: A man is forced to confront his past after he loses everything in an accident. Mustafa is a successful business man living a seemingly great life with his family when an accident takes it ...                See full summary »

name: Beatriz at Dinner
summary_text: A holistic medicine practitioner attends a wealthy client's dinner party after her car breaks down.

name: Chemical Hearts
summary_text: A high school transfer student finds a new passion when she begins to work on the school's newspaper.

name: Body Bags
summary_text: Three short stories in the horror genre: the first about a serial killer, the second about a hair transplant gone wrong, and the third about a baseball player.

name: The Hairdresser's Husband
summary_text: Antoine has always been fascinated with a hairdresser's delicate touch, the beguiling perfume and the figure of a woman with an opulent bosom, moreover, he knew that he would marry one, fulfilling his dream of a perfect and idealised love.

name: Left Behind: The Movie
summary_text: The Biblical prophecy of Armegeddon begins when the Rapture instantly takes all believers in Christ from the Earth. A reporter left behind learns that the Anti-Christ will soon take power.

name: Flowers in the Attic
summary_text: After the sudden death of their father, four children face cruel treatment from their ruthless grandmother.

name: A Soldier's Story
summary_text: An African-American officer investigates a murder in a racially charged situation in World War II.

name: Ju-on 2
summary_text: As their curse spreads on, the ghosts find their chance to live once again through the pregnancy of a cursed woman.

name: Beau travail
summary_text: This film focuses on an ex-Foreign Legion officer as he recalls his once glorious life, leading troops in Djibouti.

name: Police Story: Lockdown
summary_text: A man looking for the release of a long-time prisoner takes a police officer, his daughter, and a group of strangers hostage.

name: Why Did I Get Married Too?
summary_text: Four couples find themselves struggling to save their marriages once again on their annual marriage retreat, while each of them battle through financial, physical, mental, and emotional issues.

name: Lazer Team
summary_text: Four losers are thrust into the position of saving the world when they stumble upon a UFO crash site and become genetically equipped to the battle suit on board.

name: Frankenhooker
summary_text: A medical student sets out to recreate his decapitated fiancée by building her a new body made of Manhattan street prostitutes.

name: Jane Eyre
summary_text: Jane Eyre is an orphan cast out as a young girl by her aunt, Mrs. Reed, and sent to be raised in a harsh charity school for girls. There she learns to become a teacher and eventually seeks ...                See full summary »

name: UFO
summary_text: A college student, who sees a UFO, uses his exceptional math skills to investigate the sighting with his friends while the FBI follows closely behind.

name: The Inglorious Bastards
summary_text: In 1944 France, a group of escaped American military prisoners en route to Switzerland volunteers to steal a Nazi V2 rocket warhead for the Allies.

name: The Wind Will Carry Us
summary_text: Irreverent city engineer Behzad comes to a rural village in Iran to keep vigil for a dying relative. In the meanwhile the film follows his efforts to fit in with the local community and how he changes his own attitudes as a result.

name: Bread and Tulips
summary_text: After being forgotten in a highway café during a bus trip, a housewife decides to start a new life by herself in Venice.

name: Othello
summary_text: The Moorish General Othello is manipulated into thinking that his new wife Desdemona has been carrying on an affair with his Lieutenant Michael Cassio, when in reality, it is all part of the scheme of a bitter Ensign named Iago.

name: Deep Cover
summary_text: A uniformed cop is recruited by a drug enforcement agent to infiltrate a drug smuggling ring looking to expand its operation.

name: Nói albinói
summary_text: Is he the village idiot or a genius in disguise? 17 year old Noi drifts through life on a remote fjord in the north of Iceland. In winter, the fjord is cut off from the outside world, ...                See full summary »

name: Bill Burr: Paper Tiger
summary_text: Bill Burr unloads on outrage culture, male feminism, cultural appropriation, robot sex and more in a blistering stand-up special shot in London.
